attributes.action: Consecutive sentences for Sex Offenders - Protect the innocent children.
attributes.additional_details:
Defendants are likely to receive concurrent sentences for offences against individual victims. 

How many more chances do the offenders get the victims get know and have to live or try to live with little support and no real protection everyday for the rest of their lives, Its time to give the children a chance!! 

The whole process around these cases need to be reviewed 

Not allowed to supply specific details as you will reject the petition but I have details for discussion
attributes.background: Consecutive sentences for Sex Offenders - When you release them and they reoffend the public should be notified just like the original case it in is their interest. Topical at the moment is the issue of the proper sentence to impose on defendants in sexual offences cases
